244309.「フン。ほんとに アタイが見えてるのかい？: Hmm. Are you sure you can see me?

244310.「そうよ～ なんといっても\n わたくしの 一番弟子なんだもの。:
That's right~ after all, you are my number one
disciple.

244311.「<pc>さん。こちらの キャルさんから\n あなたに お仕事の依頼がきてるのよ:
<pc>. Cal here has offered you a job.
So let's talk to her.

244312.「どうやら 見えてるようだね……よかった。: Looks like you can see me...thank goodness.

244313.「どいつも こいつも アタイのことを\n 無視しやがるから クサクサしてたんだ。:
I've been feeling a little crummy because they've been ignoring me, just like that sleepyhead over there. Like that sleepyhead
over there.

244314.「まっ これが デスマスターと一般人の\n ちがいってやつ なのかねぇ。:
I guess this is the difference between death
masters and ordinary people.

244315.「……依頼の話に移ろうか。アタイはさ\n ここの そばにある墓地に 葬られたんだ:
Let's move on to the request. Me, I was buried
in a graveyard near here, but as you can see,
I'm a wandering ghost...

244316.「心残りがあるせいで 現世にしばられて\n いつまでも 昇天できなくてね。\n:
I'm stuck in this life because I have regrets
and I can't ascend. I want you to solve it.

244317.「生前は 用心棒を なりわいにしていたんだけど\n グレン領西で 行商人の護衛を:
Before his death, he was a bouncer by trade,
but when he was escorting a peddler in Glen
West, he was attacked by monsters...

244318.「客を守るため 敵を引きつけ 奮闘したんだけど\n あえなく 死んじまった……ま:
He fought hard to protect his customers by attracting the enemy, but he died in the end... but that's just the way the business
is. I think.

244319.「ただね 愛用の扇を かすめ取られたことだけは\n いまだに くやしくってね……:
The only thing that still bothers me is the
fact that they took away my favorite fan... it
was the pride of my life as a martial artist!

244320.「グレン領西の中央か 南西あたりにいる\n ウィングデビルを仕留め アタイの扇を:
I need you to take out the Aggrosculpture in
the center or southwest of Glen West and get
me my fan back. Please! That's right!

244321.「安心してくださいな。<pc>さんなら\n きっと やりとげてくれます。\n わ:
Don't worry. I am sure that <pc> will
make it. I give you my seal of approval.

244322.「アタイは そろそろ ラクになりたいんだ。\n 頼んだよ……<pc>。:
I'm just trying to be comfortable.
Please...<pc>.

244323.「ちょっと <pc>！\n アンタ 誰と話してるのよ！？: Hey, <pc>! Who are you talking to?

244324.「むっき～！ いいな いいなぁ。\n ずるい！ ずーるーいー！:
Mukki~! I like it. I like it. That's not
fair! That's not fair!

244325.「アタシなんかさぁ ダーマ神官のとこ行っても\n デスマスターに なれなかったん:
I couldn't become a death master even if I
went to an Abbey Priest!

244326.「お前には 素質がない。デスマスターにとって\n 欠くべからざる 霊感というもの:
You have no qualities. You lack the monster of
inspiration that is essential for a death
master! And so they say...

244327.「霊感ゼロとか ありえないじゃん もうッ！:
How is it possible that he has no psychic
sense?

244328.「もしもし 幽霊さん……今 そばにいる？\n いたら 返事して。アタシの霊感を:
Hello, ghost... are you around right now? If
you are, answer me. Prove that I'm psychic.

244329.「あらあら まあまあ。お気の毒さまだけど\n 霊感がないんじゃ どうしようもない:
Oh, dear, oh, dear. I'm sorry to hear that,
but if you're not psychic, there's nothing we
can do about it.

244330.「落ち込んでる ネリムちゃんが\n 気になるだろうけど あなたは 初仕事を\n:
I know you're probably wondering why Nelim is
down in the dumps, but you need to focus on
getting your first job done.

246592.「えっ！ デズ師匠と いっしょに 幽霊さんと\n 話してたの！？ アタシが 寝て:
Oh, my God! You and Master Des were talking to
a ghost? While I was sleeping?

246594.「マジで？ 幽霊さん まだ そばにいるの！？: Really? The ghost is still around?

246595.「あー そっかぁ……デスマスターじゃない\n アタシには 見えないんだろうね……:
Oh, I see...I'm not a death master, so I guess
I can't see it...maybe...maybe...maybe...
